original_text: For they all contributed out of their abundance, but she out of her poverty put in all she had to live on.”
korean_text: 저들은 그 풍족한 중에서 헌금을 넣었거니와 이 과부는 그 가난한 중에서 자기가 가지고 있는 생활비 전부를 넣었느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: For they all contributed out of their abundance
but she out of her poverty
put in all she had to live on.
